eu.df.jiffybox.internal

Class DefaultModuleFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.df.jiffybox.ModuleFactory
      • eu.df.jiffybox.internal.DefaultModuleFactory

  • public class DefaultModuleFactory
extends ModuleFactory
    The default module factory is used to obtain module instances.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DefaultModuleFactory(java.lang.String host, java.lang.String version, java.lang.String token)
      Create a default module factory.
